page.title: 16HOME LIFE C. CROOKHAM
page.content:
A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JOANNA DEE
My name is{Joanna Dee. }I am aged eleven. My mum teaches and my dad works with computers. I wake up at 7.00 a.m. and every morning I do some exercises, but by 7.20 a.m. I am dressed. I go and clean out my rabbit's hutch and give him food. After my breakfast of cereal I collect my dinner money and school bag. At 8.30a.m. I leave the house and meet my friends by the canal bridge. We arrive at Velmead School at 8.46a.m. School usually starts with assembly and then back to work. We work in groups in maths and we do topic work and art.. In our school there is no timetable. At the end of the day I return home to watch T.V. or play.
